00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030   using namespace Serialization;
00031 
00032   CommBuf *
00033   MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(const char *tablename,
00034                                               const char *schemastr) {
00035     CommHeader header(COMMAND_CREATE_TABLE);
00036     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, encoded_length_vstr(tablename)
00037         + encoded_length_vstr(schemastr));
00038     cbuf->append_vstr(tablename);
00039     cbuf->append_vstr(schemastr);
00040     return cbuf;
00041   }
00042 
00043   CommBuf *
00044   MasterProtocol::create_alter_table_request(const char *tablename,
00045       const char *schemastr) {
00046     CommHeader header(COMMAND_ALTER_TABLE);
00047     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, encoded_length_vstr(tablename)
00048         + encoded_length_vstr(schemastr));
00049     cbuf->append_vstr(tablename);
00050     cbuf->append_vstr(schemastr);
00051     return cbuf;
00052   }
00053 
00054   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_get_schema_request(const char *tablename) {
00055     CommHeader header(COMMAND_GET_SCHEMA);
00056     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, encoded_length_vstr(tablename));
00057     cbuf->append_vstr(tablename);
00058     return cbuf;
00059   }
00060 
00061   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_status_request() {
00062     CommHeader header(COMMAND_STATUS);
00063     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 0);
00064     return cbuf;
00065   }
00066 
00067   CommBuf *
00068   MasterProtocol::create_register_server_request(const String &location) {
00069     CommHeader header(COMMAND_REGISTER_SERVER);
00070     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, encoded_length_vstr(location));
00071     cbuf->append_vstr(location);
00072     return cbuf;
00073   }
00074 
00075   CommBuf *
00076   MasterProtocol::create_report_split_request(const TableIdentifier *table,
00077       const RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log_dir,
00078       uint64_t soft_limit) {
00079     CommHeader header(COMMAND_REPORT_SPLIT);
00080     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, table->encoded_length()
00081         + range.encoded_length() + encoded_length_vstr(transfer_log_dir) + 8);
00082     table->encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00083     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00084     cbuf->append_vstr(transfer_log_dir);
00085     cbuf->append_i64(soft_limit);
00086     return cbuf;
00087   }
00088 
00089   CommBuf *
00090   MasterProtocol::create_drop_table_request(const char *table_name,
00091                                             bool if_exists) {
00092     CommHeader header(COMMAND_DROP_TABLE);
00093     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 1 + encoded_length_vstr(table_name));
00094     cbuf->append_bool(if_exists);
00095     cbuf->append_vstr(table_name);
00096     return cbuf;
00097   }
00098 
00099   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_shutdown_request() {
00100     CommHeader header(COMMAND_SHUTDOWN);
00101     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 0);
00102     return cbuf;
00103   }

00105   const char *MasterProtocol::m_command_strings[] = {
00106     "create table",
00107     "get schema",
00108     "status",
00109     "register server",
00110     "report split",
00111     "drop table",
00112     "shutdown"
00113   };
00114 
00115   const char *MasterProtocol::command_text(uint64_t command) {
00116     if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00117       return "UNKNOWN";
00118     return m_command_strings[command];
00119   }
